name: Saving Icelandic Hip Hop
summary: Listen to this episode from Rizamblings on Spotify. Longest ramble yet with designer/writer/genius, Simon Collison, on design, poetry, New Adventures, Iceland, Samurai Jack & much more..   Find our guest:  Simon Collison -> @colly  Don't forget to #RizambleAlong on Twitter, find me -> @rizbizkits
